Actions.Name: Super Macro
Actions.Tooltip:
Simulates a keyboard and also allows you to choose the delay between each key press (between 1ms to 2000ms).
Supports actions like {{ctrl}{alt}{f1}} or even {{shift}{home}}{{ctrl}{c}} [Select text and copy to clipboard] to create complex macros.
The customizable delay is great for macros in games that expect a little longer delay between every key press.

Actions.Name: Super Macro Toggle
Actions.Tooltip: Toggle between two different sets of Super Macros.

Actions.Name: Sticky Super Macro
Actions.Tooltip: Repeats the same macro again and again, until the key is pressed again.

Actions.Name: Sticky Keystroke
Actions.Tooltip: Repeats the same keystroke again and again, until the key is pressed again. Example of usage is games that don't have an auto-run feature and require a keystroke to run

Actions.Name: Keystroke PTT
Actions.Tooltip: Repeats a keystroke again and again as long as you press the button. Can be either one single character or one set of keystrokes (like {{ctrl}{f5}} to refresh)

Author: BarRaider
Description:
Simulates both keyboard and mouse. Allows you to choose the delay between each key press (between 1ms to 2000ms).
Supports actions like {{ctrl}{alt}{f1}} or even {{shift}{home}}{{ctrl}{c}} [Select text and copy to clipboard] to create complex macros. Supports a large variety of programs and games
Name: SuperMacro
